trans-unit.source: Represents a connection point that is displayed on the outer edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Representa um ponto de ligação que é apresentado nas extremidades externas de um designer de atividade numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A connection point appears as a small square on the edge of an activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um ponto de ligação é apresentado como um quadrado pequeno na margem de uma superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: It is used as a point where a Connector can originate on the activity designer to connect it with another activity designer.
trans-unit.target: É utilizado como um ponto em que um conector pode ter origem no estruturador de atividades a ligá-lo com o designer de atividade outro.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value, and an integer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> valor de enumeração e um número inteiro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> ao qual pertence o ponto de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value that specifies where on the activity designer the connection point is located.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> valor de enumeração que especifica onde o designer de atividade o ponto de ligação está localizado.

trans-unit.source: An index location of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma localização de índice de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: connectionIndex is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: connectionIndexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: -- or -- connectionIndex is greater than or equal to the number of connection points on associatedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: - ou - connectionIndex é maior que ou igual ao número de pontos de ligação no associatedDesigner.

trans-unit.source: associatedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: associatedDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity designer to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer de atividade à qual pertence o ponto de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> ao qual pertence o ponto de ligação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connection point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para o ponto de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que os limites de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge on which the connection point appears.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contorno designer no qual o ponto de ligação é apresentada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> that specifies the activity designer edge on which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> appears.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> que especifica o limite do estruturador de atividade no qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> aparece.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de ligação para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer uses ConnectionIndex to identify a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in the read-only <xref:System.Drawing.Point> collection returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade utiliza ConnectionIndex para identificar um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>no só de leitura <xref:System.Drawing.Point>coleção devolvido pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que representa o índice de ligação para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> é igual para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para a comparação com a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: to indicate that the current and obj are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: para indicar que o atual e obj são igual; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash code generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex*> integer or the designer available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>.
trans-unit.target: O código hash gerado pelo <> </> *> um número inteiro ou o estruturador disponível através de <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a point that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um ponto que representa a localização da lógica de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> no associada <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa a localização da lógica de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> no associada <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs all tasks required to render the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Efetua todas as tarefas necessárias para compor o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the data
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a highlighted connection point; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para desenhar um ponto de ligação realçado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
